info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:29PM CDT until August 03 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Northeastern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Northeastern St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Alton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alton, Godfrey and East Alton around 440 PM CDT. Wood River, Pontoon Beach, South Roxana and Hartford around 445 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bethalto, Roxana, Rosewood Heights, Edwardsville and Dorsey. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 23. This also includes Confluence State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
